first_para: Paul Kenneth Burstow (born 13 May 1962), British politician, is the Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Sutton and Cheam.

full.extract:
Paul Kenneth Burstow (born 13 May 1962), British politician, is the Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Sutton and Cheam.
In May 2010 he was appointed Minister of State for the Department of Health and served in that position until September 2012.
full.title: Paul Burstow
